content: Fluent in English, French, Spanish and German, Paul Morphy was one of the most learned chess players of his time.
translations: ita:Parlando fluentemente inglese, francese, spagnolo e tedesco, Paul Morphy fu uno dei giocatori di scacchi pi√π colti del s
